welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Stamford, a charming city known for its beautiful parks, vibrant arts scene, and diverse culinary offerings. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore all that Stamford has to offer!"

restaurants.name: Cafe Black
restaurants.description: Cafe Black is a café located in Stamford.

restaurants.name: PizzaExpress
restaurants.description: PizzaExpress is a pizzeria located in Lincolnshire.

restaurants.name: No1 Kitchen
restaurants.description: No1 Kitchen is a burger joint located in Stamford.

restaurants.name: Mama Liz's
restaurants.description: Mama Liz's is a cajun and creole restaurant located in Stamford.

restaurants.name: The Mad Turk
restaurants.description: The Mad Turk is a turkish restaurant located in Lincolnshire.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights operated by major airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves international and domestic flights operated by smaller airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Danbury Municipal Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Danbury Municipal Airport is dedicated for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers to use.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Igor I. Sikorsky Memorial Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Igor I. Sikorsky Memorial Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Republic Field Airport is a small and modern facility, offering a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The private aviation terminal at Republic Field Airport caters to private and corporate aircraft, providing a luxurious and exclusive experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal primarily serves domestic flights and is the oldest terminal at LaGuardia Airport.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves both domestic and international flights and is currently undergoing a major renovation and expansion project.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal primarily serves domestic flights and is the newest terminal at LaGuardia Airport, opened in 2019.

terminals.name: Terminal D
terminals.description: This terminal serves primarily Delta Air Lines flights and is the largest terminal at LaGuardia Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but it may be limited in some areas.
